statements: SELECT * FROM team_performance;
SELECT team_name, wins, losses FROM team_performance;
SELECT team_name, league_standings FROM team_performance WHERE goals_scored > 50;
SELECT team_id, team_name, league_standings, wins, losses, goals_scored FROM team_performance ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_performance WHERE league_standings < 5 ORDER BY goals_scored ASC;
SELECT team_name, wins, losses FROM team_performance WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM team_performance WHERE league_standings > 3 ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, goals_scored, wins FROM team_performance WHERE goals_scored > 50 AND wins > 10 ORDER BY wins DESC, goals_scored ASC;
SELECT team_name, losses, goals_scored, league_standings FROM team_performance WHERE goals_scored BETWEEN 30 AND 60 ORDER BY league_standings ASC;
SELECT team_name, wins, losses FROM team_performance WHERE wins > 5 AND losses < 3 ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM league_standings
SELECT team_name, wins FROM league_standings ORDER BY wins DESC
SELECT team_name, losses FROM league_standings WHERE losses > 5
SELECT team_name, goals_scored FROM league_standings WHERE goals_scored BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT * FROM match_results WHERE result = 'Win'
SELECT team_name, wins, losses FROM league_standings ORDER BY wins DESC, losses ASC
SELECT * FROM league_standings WHERE team_name = 'Arsenal' OR team_name = 'Man United'
SELECT team_name, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals FROM league_standings GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_goals DESC
SELECT team_name, wins AS victories, losses AS defeats FROM league_standings WHERE wins > 10
SELECT team_name, wins, losses, goals_scored FROM league_standings WHERE goals_scored > 50 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC
SELECT * FROM league_standings WHERE wins > 5 ORDER BY position ASC;
SELECT team_name, wins, losses FROM league_standings WHERE position < 3 ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT home_team, away_team, home_goals, away_goals FROM matches WHERE home_goals > away_goals ORDER BY match_id ASC;
SELECT team_name, goals_scored, games_played FROM team_stats WHERE games_played >= 10 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT team_name, wins, losses, position FROM league_standings WHERE wins + losses = 10 ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT * FROM league_standings WHERE wins > 5
SELECT team_name, wins, position FROM league_standings ORDER BY wins DESC
SELECT team_name, goals_scored, games_played FROM team_stats WHERE goals_scored >= 20 ORDER BY games_played ASC
SELECT * FROM league_standings WHERE position = 1 AND wins >= 8
SELECT home_team, away_team, home_goals, away_goals FROM matches WHERE home_goals > away_goals
SELECT * FROM league_standings ORDER BY total_wins DESC
SELECT team_name, total_wins, total_losses FROM league_standings WHERE total_losses > 5
SELECT team_name, total_goals_scored FROM league_standings WHERE total_wins >= 10
SELECT * FROM wins WHERE season_year = 2021 ORDER BY wins DESC
SELECT team_name, goals_scored FROM goals_scored WHERE goals_scored > 50
SELECT team_name, total_wins FROM league_standings
SELECT team_name, total_losses FROM league_standings WHERE total_losses > 5 ORDER BY total_losses DESC
SELECT team_name, total_goals_scored FROM league_standings WHERE total_wins > 10 AND total_goals_scored < 40
SELECT team_name, total_wins, total_losses, total_goals_scored FROM league_standings WHERE total_wins + total_losses > 20
SELECT * FROM wins INNER JOIN goals_scored ON wins.team_name = goals_scored.team_name WHERE wins.wins > 15
SELECT team_name, standing FROM LeagueStandings;
SELECT * FROM Matches ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT team_name, total_wins, total_losses FROM Teams WHERE total_wins > 10;
SELECT player_name, position FROM Players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, SUM(wins) AS total_wins, SUM(losses) AS total_losses FROM LeagueStandings GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, standing, wins, losses FROM LeagueStandings WHERE standing > 3 ORDER BY wins DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT team_name, total_wins, total_losses FROM Teams WHERE total_wins >= 10 AND total_losses < 5 ORDER BY total_wins DESC, total_losses ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, team_name, position FROM Players JOIN Teams ON Players.team_id = Teams.team_id WHERE Teams.total_wins > 5 ORDER BY player_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT team_name, SUM(wins) as total_wins, SUM(losses) as total_losses FROM LeagueStandings GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_wins DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT Teams.team_name, Players.player_name, GoalsScored.goal_minute FROM Teams JOIN Players ON Teams.team_id = Players.team_id JOIN GoalsScored ON Teams.team_id = GoalsScored.team_id WHERE GoalsScored.goal_minute < 10 ORDER BY GoalsScored.goal_minute ASC LIMIT 5;
